title: Advent
verses: Don't you see my Je-sus coming, Don't you
Don't you see the saints as-cend-ing, Hear them
see in yonder cloud! With ten thousand angels
shouting through the air! Jesus ami-ling, trumpets
round him, With ten thousand an-gels round him,

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Classic Millerite hymn expressing anticipation of Christ's return with angels
